title: decoy image
extract: Definition of decoy (Entry 2 of 2) transitive verb. hunting. : to lure by or as if by a decoy : entice decoying ducks to a pond The undercover cop decoyed the fugitive into a trap. Synonyms Choose the Right Synonym More Example Sentences Learn More about decoy.
